meleeBars.name: Cleave Damage
meleeBars.description: Damage delivered to additional enemies Hit beyond the main target.

meleeBars.name: Cleave Targets
meleeBars.description: The higher the Cleave, the more enemies Hit in one swing.

meleeBars.name: Critical Bonus
meleeBars.description: Chance of landing a Critical Hit and how much Damage it will do.

meleeBars.name: Crowd Control
meleeBars.description: Increases a weapon's Stagger, Impact and Cleave

meleeBars.name: Damage
meleeBars.description: How much Damage the weapon inflicts.

meleeBars.name: Defences
meleeBars.description: Affects Stamina efficiency, as well as the length and speed of dashes.

meleeBars.name: Finesse
meleeBars.description: Increases the Weapon's attack Speed and grants bonuses to Critical Hits and Weak Spot Hits.
modifiers: Light Attack Critical and Weakspot Power: x multiplier
Heavy Attack Critical and Weakspot Power: x multiplier

meleeBars.name: First Target
meleeBars.description: How much Damage done to the first Enemy Hit when hitting multiple enemies in one swing.
modifiers: Light Attack Power vs First Target: x multiplier
Heavy Attack Power vs First Target: x multiplier

meleeBars.name: Mobility
meleeBars.description: Measure of Movement Speed, Sprint Speed, and Dodge distance bonus while the weapon is active.

meleeBars.name: Penetration
modifiers: Light Attack Damage vs Flak Armoured: %
Heavy Attack Damage vs Flak Armoured: %
Heavy Attack Damage vs Carapace Armoured: %

meleeBars.name: Power Output
meleeBars.description: Damage inflicted by the powered up/activated attacks on Power Maul and similar power weapons

meleeBars.name: Shredder
meleeBars.description: Measure of a weapon's damage while its 'Rev' Special Action is active.

meleeBars.name: Warp Resistance
meleeBars.description: Use of this weapon increases a Psyker's Peril. The higher the Warp Resistance, the less Peril is generated with each attack.
